name: Gretl Crawford
statement:
**Elected Experience**  
No Information Submitted  
  
**Other Professional Experience**  
Gretl Crawford Homes and Interiors, Owner Custom Home Builder/Commercial Development  
Over 20 years business/Developing Experience Winner of numerous awards, recognitions It’s All in the Details Store Owner, 6 years  
Developer: Union Park Development in Kennewick: 8 businesses, mostly women-owned Kennedy Plaza: Richland, 4 businesses  
  
**Education:**  
Graduated Kamiakin High School, Senior Class President  
Attended University of Washington and Washington State University  
Graduated WSU, Bachelors of Interior Design, Minors: Business and Fine Arts  
Vice President ASWSU student body  
  
Affiliations:  
ASID, NAHAB, TRI-CITY HBA  
BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU  
CHAMBER OF COMMERCE

**Education**  
No Information Submitted  
  
**Community Service**  
Junior achievement  
Youth Sports coach  
  
**Statement**  
We need smart, strong, decisive leadership. I have a proven record of success. I have added to Kennewick through business and development. I bring experience, integrity, proven leadership and diversity to City Council.  
I understand the challenges and struggles of small businesses. I represent them. I will encourage retail and service growth for our growing population. I will support more entertainment options to keep community dollars here. I will incentivize new development and private enterprise: creating jobs.  
I will work with City leaders and government, addressing city zoning and planning issues. Encourage development along our river, working alongside developers, Port officials and small business owners to make it happen. I will work on affordable housing options and address rising regulations and fees.  
Married 25 years and a mother of 3, I understand the concerns of working families. I will work for you. I will represent the core values and principles of a growing community, promote lifelong education, continue to improve our community parks and recreational areas to support a thriving community and support programs that keep our city safe.  
I will work for you, the voters. I hope I can count on your vote.  
www.votegretl.com
